name: nativescript-pdf-viewer
description: A NativeScript plugin to display PDF files on iOS and Android, with support for Xcode 8

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.debug.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug ios --emulator
scripts.debug.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug android --emulator
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-pdf-viewer && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm install && cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..

author: Essent
